title: Suche Team/Searching for team
body:
Hello,
im from Germany and i am looking for some guys to play in a team together. Why? Because its funnier together and i want to improve myself.
At the Moment i am at plat 5 in solo q. I played league since season 1 and i played literally every season a different position. At the moment i play ADC a lot and mid offrole. But i am fine with every lane.
Hope someone is interested. PM me in League: Mcmercy
Or write a comment{{champion:51}}

replies.body: Hey das ist der deutsche Server (;
